title: Apple Introduces iPhone 12 With 5G
itunes:title: Apple Introduces iPhone 12 With 5G
description:
Dr. Ian Lustbader, Clinical Professor of Medicine at NYU, provides a coronavirus and vaccine update. Bloomberg News White House Correspondent Josh Wingrove talks about President Trump undercutting a campaign reset as he weighs the prospect of defeat. Craig Moffett, Founding Partner and Senior Analyst at MoffettNathanson, discusses the launch of the iPhone 12 and the roll out of 5G. And we Drive to the Close with Michael Sheldon, CIO at Hightower RDM Financial Group.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Paul Sweeney. Producer: Doni Holloway. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
